text.text_translated:
The Hunger Games takes place in the future. North America was destroyed.
The country is called **Panem**. It has twelve poor areas.
The rich **Capitol** controls these areas. The Capitol is a city. It has all the power over the country.
Each area makes different things for the **Capitol**. The story starts in Area 12. Area 12 gives all the black rock for the country.
There was a thirteenth area. It fought against the **Capitol**. It wanted to stop the Capitol's rule. So, the **Capitol** destroyed it.
